description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Jaipur, India. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Heritage Jaipur Palace Opulence with Art Deco-Style Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Be transported to 19th-century resplendance at Rajmahal Palace RAAS Jaipur, once the palace of maharajas and the chosen accommodaton for Queen Elizabeth II upon her visit to the Pink City. Indulge with world-class facilities, including three eclectic dining spaces, a stunning outdoor pool and boutique courtyard. Away from the resort, Jaipur is yours to explore - stroll through bustling bazaars, taste delectable Rajasthani cuisine and peruse the majestic Amber Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

hotels.title: Central Jaipur Escape with Rooftop Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Spend time in the colourful city of Jaipur with Holiday Inn Jaipur City Centre, an IHG Hotel as your base for exploration. When you're not getting delightfully lost in the vivid pink streets, spend time splashing about in the rooftop swimming pool that offers spectcular panoramas of the city. Choose from three onsite dining venues during your stay, enjoying a hearty breakfast at Monarch, an authentic Indian-style lunch at Chao or cocktails and light bites at RoadHouse Bar & Grill.

hotels.title: Pink City Luxury near Jaipur Airport with Spa & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: A short distance from Jaipur Airport, Crowne Plaza Jaipur Tonk Road, an IHG Hotel is a luxe oasis amid an urban jungle. Savour succulent cuisine at the onsite restaurants, indulge in a revitalising spa treatment or invigorate body and mind at the fitness centre. Take a refreshing plunge into the outdoor pool after exploring the marvellous markets and awe-inspiring architecture that Jaipur has to offer. After a memorable day in the Pink City, retire to a refined room for a good night's sleep.

hotels.title: Jaipur Opulent Palace Retreat with Rooftop Infinity Pool, Onsite Spa & Three Restaurants
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the regal splendour of Jaipur with a stay at this palatial haven. Nestled near the forts and cultural treasures of the Pink City, this majestic retreat features opulent suites with private balconies and a personalised butler service. Indulge in the serenity of the Raffles Spa, where aromatic treatments and mineral pools restore balance, or unwind in the sparkling rooftop infinity pool. Savour elevated dining and reimagined North Indian cuisine at Arkaa, sip fine wine at the elegant The Writers Bar or delight in tea-time delicacies at the vibrant Safir Tea & Champagne Lounge. Step beyond the hotel to discover vibrant bazaars, ancient palaces and tranquil landmarks like Jal Mahal. This is Jaipur as you’ve never experienced it before.
